title: The smartAPI extension to OpenAPI 3.0.
description: This is the root document object of the smartAPI definition file.

x-accessRestriction.description: Indicate whether there are restrictions to using the API. Values to use: none, limited, fee.

x-id.description: A resolvable HTTP URI that uniqely identifies the contact (e.g. orcid id github id)

x-location.description: Location, city and country of the server hosting the API.

x-accessRestriction.description: Access restrictions to invoke the operation. values: none, limited, fee.

x-description.description: A short description of the target documentation. CommonMark syntax can be used for rich text representation.

x-parameterType.description: Type of parameter, e.g. InputParameter, NumberOfResultsReturned, OffsetParameter, SortParameter.

x-valueType.description: a list of semantic identifiers of the parameter from identifiers.org, e.g. [http://identifiers.org/ncbigene/]

x-path.description: The path, using dot notation, to the element of interest

x-valueType.description: The value type as specified by a concept URI for the element of interest

x-id.description: The name of the tag. Recommend that you use URI to specify the concept.

specificationExtension.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

x-url.description: The URL to a non-JSON schema.
